answers.q: what category is e504 in ruby princess
answers.a: In food additives, E504 is magnesium carbonates, classified mainly as a carrier and also used as an anti-caking and acidity-regulating/rising agent.

answers.q: what year is a tree farmer skidder serial number e504-019
answers.a: That serial number isnâ€™t related to the food additive; in food labeling, E504 refers to magnesium carbonates used as a carrier/anti-caking/acidity regulator.

answers.q: why take calcium and magnesium carbonates
answers.a: They are used as antacids to neutralize stomach acid and as mineral supplements to provide calcium and magnesium; in foods they also serve as acidity regulators and anti-caking agents.
